scripts.build-nginx: docker rmi -f social-site-demo-backend_nginx && cd ./frontend_svelte && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-api: docker rmi -f social-site-demo-backend_api   && cd ./backend_api_mongodb && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.access-up: docker compose -f compose_access.yaml up --detach && docker exec -it 'social-site-demo-access_container-1' sh
scripts.clear-logs: docker volume rm 'social-site-demo_api_logs' && docker volume rm 'social-site-demo_nginx_logs' && docker volume rm 'social-site-demo_mongo_logs'
